message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm. I'm willing to pay $95 for it.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $95. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. I can sell it to you for $110.
I understand your position, Alice. Let's try $100 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $115. I'm willing to make a slight compromise, but I think this price is more in line with the product's value.
Considering the product's value, I would like to propose $110 as the final price.
I'm glad we're close, Bob! However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $110. I'm willing to go up to $112.50, but that's as high as I'm willing to go.
Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose $112 as the final price for the product.
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob! However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $115. I'm willing to meet you at $113, but that's as low as I can go.
After considering all our previous discussions, I believe $112 is a fair price for the product. I hope you can agree to this final offer.
